nodes.text: The Infinity Plain was a plain located on the planet Dathomir on which was situated a Kwa Star Temple that contained an Infinity Gate. By the time of the rise of the Galactic Empire, the Infinity Plain had fallen within the territory of the Singing Mountain Clan and in about 18 BBY, the Jedi Knight Jax Pavan contacted the clan to request that he be granted permission to enter the plain, so that he could visit the Star Temple. Pavan was granted access to the ruin and he was escorted across the Infinity Plain to the temple by the Dathomiri adept Magash Drashi.
